name: Infinite Runner (Nythen)
description:
This minigame was started as an exercice from the Master on Videogames Programming and Virtual Reality of TokioSchool.

I was quite proud of the result, so I worked to improve the project and use it as a porfolio.

The game is programmed in C# and Unity. You'll find a main menu with an local highscores table and an inifite level where you have to jump enemies and gather jewels.
